----- Original Message ---- 
From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 

>Perceptor: 
>
> PErceptor cursed and copntinued trying to block the signal and 
> suscessfully did it, commanded that base go down to lava again and 
> locked down the doors, all commands were done using a private channel 
> also Perceptor commanded the order to release internal defences with 
> the order to shot against all unknow signatures. 
>
> Internal weapons tracked the spy. 

The intruder continued to move through the halls in the direction he had originally come. Attempting to utilize his stealth shielding against the internal weapons systems, he appeared as almost invisible to them, only his need for speed alowing them time for the occasional lock on him!

Meanwhile at the nexus center where he had been the computer, as per his last instruction it continued in a cycle the command to open the base doors and raise the base out of the magma, even as Perceptor gave the orders to the contrary. Hopefully that would slow down his pursuers and give him time to escape!

Finally he arrived at the shuttle bay, the place he had arrived from, he stopped to look around carefully. High up in the room his initial small spider spy he had placed here before he left positioned itself on the main doors, hopefully hidden from view.

Preston
(Da'minion)
